rooms.description: Spacious entryway leading to an open-plan living room with Art Deco accents. The area features a blend of traditional and modern furniture, geometric patterns in the decor, and natural light from large windows.

Dedicated workspace designed for productivity, featuring soundproofing elements, abundant natural lighting, and integrated storage solutions. Art Deco motifs are used in the finishes to maintain the overall design language.
Modern kitchen with Art Deco detailing on cabinetry and fixtures. Equipped with modern appliances, ample storage, and an efficient layout ensuring smooth workflow from prep to serving.
Small service area for laundry, dishwashing, and storage of cleaning supplies. Designed compactly but efficiently.

openings.description: Large, Art Deco styled front door with secure locking mechanism.
Stylish windows with geometric patterns and enhanced glazing to maintain indoor temperatures.
Each bedroom on upper levels features a spacious balcony designed for relaxation and natural ventilation.

rooms.description: Largest bedroom featuring a private ensuite bathroom, Art Deco inspired interior finishes, and access to an expansive balcony. Positioned according to Vastu principles for the head of the household.
Well-lit bedroom with its own spacious balcony designed for relaxation. Decorated in Art Deco style with modern amenities.
Cozy bedroom with ample storage and a dedicated balcony ensuring privacy and natural light. Vastu compliant orientation enhances positive energy flow.

openings.description: Safety-compliant staircase with Art Deco detailing.
Doors leading from bedrooms to their dedicated balconies, ensuring privacy and outdoor space.

rooms.description: Spacious guest bedroom with access to a balcony. Furnished with comfortable amenities and designed in the Art Deco style.
Multi-functional room serving as both a study area and relaxation space, featuring modern fixtures and Art Deco decorative accents. Ensures privacy and quiet.

openings.description: Safe and well-designed staircase connecting the floors.
Provides access to the balcony, enhancing privacy and air circulation.
